EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Inquiry (1335210210.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Inquiry (1335210210.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - 1024x768 - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Andrew, I apologize for the delay in getting back to you, I just realized that I never responded to this email. Thank you for your follow up. When you have time, please reach out to me and we can schedule a time to talk and I will be happy to answer any questions you have at that time about our program. I hope things have settled down for you now that tax season is over (more or less J). I look forward to hearing from you. Have a great day,Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Andrew Kirk [mailto:arakirk@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, April 13, 2012 10:52 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Inquiry Right now I'm working a short term contract for Intuit. I do want to look into incorporating and continuing my contracting work and wanted to get an idea of what services you provide and the costs. I'm trying to figure out how much I want to do myself vs. just focusing on the work itself. I've been a little busy as it's tax season, and I'm helping out Intuit's Turbo Tax app, but after the 18th I should have more time to invest in this. From: Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> Date: Fri, 13 Apr 2012 15:42:29 -0400 To: Andrew Kirk <arakirk@gmail.com <mailto:arakirk@gmail.com>> Subject: FW: MBO Partners Inquiry Dear Andrew, Some time ago you requested information regarding the services offered by MBO Partners. Now might not be the right time for you. Whatever your work life stage, I also hope you can join me in celebrating the news that independent work life in America has arrived. Our company is well into a year-long effort called The State of Independence in America. I encourage you to view some very interesting findings on the size and trends for independent work in our nation. Are you working on a contract/project now or are you currently working W2 at the moment? Regards, Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://info.mbopartners.com/meet-the-independents.html> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Nicolette Taylor Sent: Tuesday, April 03, 2012 10:29 AM To: 'arakirk@gmail.com <mailto:>' Subject: MBO Partners Inquiry Dear Andrew, Thank you for the inquiry you submitted at the MBO Partners website. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
